item.description:
This is the way to start the summer-120 different craft beer brewers-over 500 different craft beers (better then the Red Sox winning percentage for now) If you're a beer geek-this is where you want to be-and if you're new to the craft beer experience-this is the way to start
Two sessions still available for $45 per ticket
Friday, June 1st from 6-9:30 and

Saturday, June 2 from 6-9:30

At the Seaport World Trade Center

Sorry the Saturday afternoon session I've be attending is all sold out-but there will still be plenty of great beer for that night.
Tickets are available at BeerAdvocate.com
item.name: American Craft Beer Festival
